toasts.scale_changed: Magnitude scale has been changed to {{ scale }}, page will refresh soon

contents.select_scale:
Current magnitude scale: {{ scale }}
Magnitude scale is a standard used to measure the intensity of an earthquake. Different scales can lead to different magnitude values.
contents.purge_cache:
If the app is experiencing problems, you can try resetting app preferences.
After resetting, browser preferences will be cleared, but it will not affect the backend server.
contents.waveform_retention:
This setting determines the amount of time that waveforms will be retained on the real-time waveform page. The current value is {{ retention }} s.
Values must be greater than 0 and less than 1000. Otherwise, the value will be reset to the default of 180 s.
contents.query_duration:
This setting determines the time range that is automatically filled in on the historical query page. The current value is {{ duration }} s.
Values must be greater than 0 and less than 3600. Otherwise, the value will be reset to the default of 300 s.
